title: gitlab release assets / uploads creating infinite duplicates due to retries
body: ### What happened? It all works almost perfectly but if run the release command twice ``` goreleaser release --clean --verbose ``` is getting on keeping to re-upload the assets but failing with message ```Name has already been taken, Filepath has already been taken]}``` although it does not skip the upload but retries infinitely and somehow manages to create new assets / packages and it never stops if you don't abort the process to stop. This creates infinite pages and assets under that same release version Some of the logs ```bash url=projects/some-project%2Fbbbbbbbbbbb/packages/generic/some-ci-tools/6%2E6%2E15/some-ci-tools_6%2E6%2E15_linux_amd64%2Etar%2Egz • failed to upload artifact, will retry try=9 artifact=some-ci-tools_6.6.15_linux_amd64.tar.gz error=POST https://gitlab.com/api/v4/projects/some-project/bbbbbbbbbbb/releases/6.6.15/assets/links: 400 {message: [Url has already been taken, Name has already been taken, Filepath has already been taken]} • failed to upload artifact, will retry try=10 artifact=some-ci-tools_6.6.15_linux_amd64.tar.gz error=POST https://gitlab.com/api/v4/projects/some-project/bbbbbbbbbbb/releases/6.6.15/assets/links: 400 {message: [Url has already been taken, Name has already been taken, Filepath has already been taken]} • uploaded file file=test-chart1-0.1.388.wrap.tgz url=projects/some-project%2Fbbbbbbbbbbb/packages/generic/some-ci-tools/6%2E6%2E15/test-chart1-0%2E1%2E388%2Ewrap%2Etgz • failed to upload artifact, will retry try=1 artifact=test-chart1-0.1.388.wrap.tgz error=POST https://gitlab.com/api/v4/projects/some-project/bbbbbbbbbbb/releases/6.6.15/assets/links: 400 {message: [Url has already been taken, Name has already been taken, Filepath has already been taken]} • uploading to release file=test-chart1-0.1.388.wrap.tgz name=test-chart1-0.1.388.wrap.tgz • uploading file as generic package file=test-chart1-0.1.388.wrap.tgz • uploaded file file=test-chart1-0.1.388.wrap.tgz url=projects/another8541238124%2Fbbbbbbbbbbb/packages/generic/some-ci-tools/6%2E6%2E15/test-chart1-0%2E1%2E388%2Ewrap%2Etgz • failed to upload artifact, will retry try=2 artifact=test-chart1-0.1.388.wrap.tgz error=POST https://gitlab.com/api/v4/projects/some-project/bbbbbbbbbbb/releases/6.6.15/assets/links: 400 {message: [Url has already been taken, Name has already been taken, Filepath has already been taken]} • uploading to release file=test-chart1-0.1.388.wrap.tgz name=test-chart1-0.1.388.wrap.tgz • uploading file as generic package file=test-chart1-0.1.388.wrap.tgz • uploaded file file=test-chart1-0.1.388.wrap.tgz url=projects/another8541238124%2Fbbbbbbbbbbb/packages/generic/some-ci-tools/6%2E6%2E15/test-chart1-0%2E1%2E388%2Ewrap%2Etgz • failed to upload artifact, will retry try=3 artifact=test-chart1-0.1.388.wrap.tgz error=POST https://gitlab.com/api/v4/projects/some-project/bbbbbbbbbbb/releases/6.6.15/assets/links: 400 {message: [Url has already been taken, Name has already been taken, Filepath has already been taken]} • uploading to release file=test-chart1-0.1.388.wrap.tgz name=test-chart1-0.1.388.wrap.tgz • uploading file as generic package file=test-chart1-0.1.388.wrap.tgz • uploaded file file=test-chart1-0.1.388.wrap.tgz url=projects/some-project%2Fbbbbbbbbbbb/packages/generic/some-ci-tools/6%2E6%2E15/test-chart1-0%2E1%2E388%2Ewrap%2Etgz • failed to upload artifact, will retry try=4 artifact=test-chart1-0.1.388.wrap.tgz error=POST https://gitlab.com/api/v4/projects/some-project/bbbbbbbbbbb/releases/6.6.15/assets/links: 400 {message: [Url has already been taken, Name has already been taken, Filepath has already been taken]} • uploading to release file=test-chart1-0.1.388.wrap.tgz name=test-chart1-0.1.388.wrap.tgz • uploading file as generic package file=test-chart1-0.1.388.wrap.tgz • uploaded file file=test-chart1-0.1.388.wrap.tgz url=projects/some-project%2Fbbbbbbbbbbb/packages/generic/some-ci-tools/6%2E6%2E15/test-chart1-0%2E1%2E388%2Ewrap%2Etgz • failed to upload artifact, will retry try=5 artifact=test-chart1-0.1.388.wrap.tgz error=POST https://gitlab.com/api/v4/projects/some-project/bbbbbbbbbbb/releases/6.6.15/assets/links: 400 {message: [Url has already been taken, Name has already been taken, Filepath has already been taken]} • uploading to release file=test-chart1-0.1.388.wrap.tgz name=test-chart1-0.1.388.wrap.tgz • uploading file as generic package file=test-chart1-0.1.388.wrap.tgz ^C ⨯ release failed after 4m7s error=ctrlc: received signal: interrupt (base) ➜ git:(master) goreleaser version ⨯ command failed error=unknown command "version" for "goreleaser release" ``` ### How can we reproduce this? ```yaml gitlab_urls: api: "{{ .Env.CI_SERVER_URL }}/api/v4/" download: "{{ .Env.CI_SERVER_URL }}" # set to true if you use a self-signed certificate skip_tls_verify: false # set to true if you want to upload to the Package Registry rather than attachments # Only works with GitLab 13.5+ use_package_registry: true ``` ```yaml release: disable: false gitlab: owner: some-group # GitLab Group name: some-project # GitLab Project # You can add extra pre-existing files to the release. # The filename on the release will be the last part of the path (base). # If another file with the same name exists, the last one found will be used. # # Templates: allowed. extra_files: - glob: ./*.tgz ``` ### goreleaser version ```bash ____ ____ _ / ___| ___ | _ \ ___| | ___ __ _ ___ ___ _ __ | | _ / _ \| |_) / _ \ |/ _ \/ _` / __|/ _ \ '__| | |_| | (_) | _ < __/ | __/ (_| \__ \ __/ | \____|\___/|_| \_\___|_|\___|\__,_|___/\___|_| goreleaser: Deliver Go Binaries as fast and easily as possible https://goreleaser.com GitVersion: 2.1.0 GitCommit: 2a1bcaca534197ba122e76812d842aedf61930fe GitTreeState: false BuildDate: 2024-07-13T17:21:33Z BuiltBy: goreleaser GoVersion: go1.22.5 Compiler: gc ModuleSum: h1:c2nYTJzCSHmWw5duS+iC/ETYLlyyBTZPesf0ABnTbhw= Platform: darwin/arm64 ``` ### GoReleaser Check - [X] goreleaser check shows no errors ### Search - [X] I did search for other open and closed issues before opening this ### Supporter - [ ] I am a [sponsor](https://github.com/sponsors/caarlos0/) or a [Pro](https://goreleaser.com/pro) customer ### Code of Conduct - [X] I agree to follow this project's Code of Conduct ### Additional context _No response_
